element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This tool calculates total volumes for a given DEM and a base elevation level. Four alternatives exist to evaluate the total volume based on how the volumes above and below the base elevation level are considered.

element.name: METHOD
element.text: The method to be used may be selected from the following: * Only volumes over base level. Will only sum up the volumes over base level. The ones below base level will be ignored. * Only volumes below base level. Will only sum up volumes below base level. Volumes over base level will be ignored. * Add the volumes over base level and subtract the volumes below it. * Add volumes both over and below base level. The volumes over and below the base level are both summed up. Both have a positive sign.

element.name: VOL
element.text: A text containing the calculated volumes. Volumes are expressed in the same units as the layer cell size (cubic units). Both the base elevation level and the values in the DEM are assumed to be in the same units as the cell size (that is, the units used for the X and Y coordinates)
